name: Roading Free
description:
This is a unofficial 2D take on the open racer game, filled with many cars to drive in across a beautiful map north of Australia. Along the way of racing to the top to be the champion, you will meet some very unique characters, both good and bad. 

(Current build is available in North America only and does not include many said features)

In order to install and play this game, you will need 7zip (or any other 7Z extractor, such as Bandizip), and Microsoft PowerPoint 2019 or later.
